Author: staunch
Content: Anything that's interesting to hackers with an explicit ban on topics primarily religious or political in nature.\n

Author: staunch
Content: People look at someone applying for a position like this as a big red flag. I think it's that simple. As others have pointed out hiring is typically a "lemon market". Unless the hiring manager is really good it makes some sense for them to move on to the next candidate.
